 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Celebrating Loyalty and Growth

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1406&user=10620> 	

It was a true pleasure to honour and celebrate our team members in the UAE who have been part of our Chalhoub Group journey for 10, 15, 20, 25, and 30 years. These milestones are more than numbers; they reflect dedication, meaningful purpose, and a deep sense of belonging.
Here’s to many more years of shared success! Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1406&user=10620> ! <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1406&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-4-min.png> 	

Join our UAE Culture Bootcamp!

chunks.text:
It was a true pleasure to honour and celebrate our team members in the UAE who have been part of our Chalhoub Group journey for 10, 15, 20, 25, and 30 years. These milestones are more than numbers; they reflect dedication, meaningful purpose, and a deep sense of belonging.
Here’s to many more years of shared success! Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1406&user=10620> ! <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1406&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-4-min.png> 	

Join our UAE Culture Bootcamp!

Don't miss this opportunity to explore what "One Team, One Culture" truly means at Chalhoub Group. The Culture Bootcamp will take you on a hands-on journey through our values, mindsets, and ways of working, helping you play an active role in our culture evolution.

 When and where? Thursday, 3rd July | 10:00 AM – 2:00 PM | D3, Retail Academy.

Spots are limited. Sign up <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1407&user=10620>  now to secure yours!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1407&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-7-min.png> 	

Recognition for Cybersecurity Leadership

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1408&user=10620> 	

We’re pleased to share that Dee Deu our Director - Information Security, has been recognised as one of UAE’s Most Influential Cybersecurity Leaders by Khaleej Times.

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1408&user=10620> 	

We’re pleased to share that Dee Deu our Director - Information Security, has been recognised as one of UAE’s Most Influential Cybersecurity Leaders by Khaleej Times. 

At FutureSec2025, peers joined from across the industry to exchange insights on the evolving threat landscape, the growing role of AI in security operations, and the importance of trust, identity, and resilience in building a secure digital future.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1408&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-3-min.png> 	

Don’t Mix Work & Personal Accounts

Keep your work and personal digital lives separate. Using personal emails or logins on work devices or vice versa can expose sensitive company data if one side is breached. This is especially important when accessing company resources remotely.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1409&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1409&user=10620> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1410&user=10620>  

Copyright © 2025 Chalhoub Group. All rights reserved. 

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group family.
